definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: What is your reflection upon Samuel's retirement speech?
sentences.chinese: 你對撒母耳的退休演講有何感想？

sentences.english: What do you think of your student life at college?
sentences.chinese: 你對大學生活有何感想？

sentences.english: I can't describe my feeling by phrases at which time.
sentences.chinese: 我無法句子言來描述我當時的感想。

sentences.english: He ducked right down to the bottom and when he came up again, he was quite beside himself.
sentences.chinese: 可是當他再冒到水面上來的時候，卻感想很是寥寂。

sentences.english: I speak from experience. I've been there.
sentences.chinese: 我的這些感想來自自己的經驗。

sentences.english: Mine is a long and sad tale.
sentences.chinese: 我的事說來話長，並且令人因感想而悲傷。

sentences.english: I write down my feelings in a language learning diary.
sentences.chinese: 寫日記，記錄學習英文的感想。

sentences.english: The last few devotions have spoken to the very depth of my heart.
sentences.chinese: 後面的一些感想讓我深入心扉。

sentences.english: I don`t know about her love for me.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道她對我的愛做如何感想。

sentences.english: Revised: What does a person thinks of after becoming a deportee ?
sentences.chinese: 一個人被驅逐之後會作何感想呢？

sentences.english: How would the great man have reacted to winning the Booker?
sentences.chinese: 這位偉大的作家對獲得布克獎究竟會作何感想？

sentences.english: I'm anxious to hear your thoughts about my presentation of the thesis.
sentences.chinese: 我希望聽聽大家對我的論文陳述有何感想。

sentences.english: How do you feel when you're handed the wine list at a restaurant ?
sentences.chinese: 當餐廳服務員遞給你一份葡萄酒單時，你做何感想？

sentences.english: Love You. This feeling is painful; itis potentiwoulsly sweet and wupper extremity.
sentences.chinese: 這種感想是痛苦的，但也是甜美的，溫暖的。

sentences.english: Please tell us your impressions of the film.
sentences.chinese: 請你談談看了這部影片後的感想。

sentences.english: How do you feel about your decision?
sentences.chinese: 你對自己做出的決定有何感想？

definition: impression or feeling after visiting or watching (movies, museums etc)

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
way of thinking/opinion/notion/to think of a way (to do sth)/CL:個|个[ge4]
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
all sorts of feelings well up in one's heart
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
